name: Gaderffii Stick
Lore: 'Notorious ''gaffi'' weapon favored by Tusken Raiders. Built from scavenged metal. Intimidates and evokes fear.',
Text: 'Use 2 Force to deploy on any Tusken Raider. If a battle has just been initiated where present, target a character for free; draw two destiny. If total destiny > 5, target''s weapons are ''knocked away'' (may not be used this battle).',
